welcome_message_body: "Welcome to University Heights, where charm and history come together! We invite you to explore our beautiful city and indulge in its renowned culinary scene. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is used by American Airlines and its Oneworld partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is mainly used by Delta Air Lines and its SkyTeam partners.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D serves low-cost carriers such as Southwest Airlines and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
